title: Drawing, Octagonal Drawing, Fame with Two Putti, Palazzo Morri, Faenza, 1816
title_raw: Octagonal Drawing, Fame with Two Putti, Palazzo Morri, Faenza
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and wash over black chalk on laid paper
inscribed: Verso: inscribed in ink, fama con corona/ delle belli arti; Faenza casa Morri.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Female genius flying against background of clouds, holds torch in right hand and three wreaths in left. Accompanied by two flying putti who embrace each other. Verso: inscribed in ink, fama con corona/ delle belli arti;  Faenza casa Morri.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Octagonal Drawing, Fame with Two Putti, Palazzo Morri, Faenza, 1816. Pen and brown ink, brush and wash over black chalk on laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3376
